summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and winds should remain light. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and very bright daylight. Little change in the weather.
